::Ramulus/Slayer::

Opening his mouth to yell for SnowCat to get out of the way, Ramulus 
swears as he sees her flying over his head. He growls, looking at 
Slayer, the two bots aproaching each other again.

"Ready for death, Maximal?" Slayer says, stepping back to keep his 
balance as laser hits him in the shoulder. His rocket launchers take 
aim again, firing a rocket at SnowCat as he watches Ramulus 
carefully. He wanted a good battle with this Maximal, the femm was 
just a distraction. He growls as a dagger digs into his back, firing 
off a rocket at BlueStreak.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> SnowCat::
> 
> She saw the rockets coming and jumped infront of Ramulus.  
Remembered 
> how he had saved her life, now it was time to repay the favor.  She 
> stood in front of him, watching the rockets home in.  Both hit her 
in 
> her side and she was flung over Ramulus and several yards away from 
> him.  She layed on her side, lots of wires were exposed.  She 
groaned 
> and stood up slowly on all fours. She glares at Striker and fired 
> both optic lazars at him.  She then started to jog over to Ramulus, 
> still firing on Striker.
